name: Fly365 Algarve
about: Fly365 Algarve is a BMAA-approved training organisation based in Lagos, Portugal, offering microlight flight training in both flexwing and fixed-wing aircraft. With over 25 years of experience, instructors Malcolm Howland and Colin Gordon provide intensive training packages, including 10 and 20-hour courses, utilizing the Quantum 912 and C42 Ikarus aircraft. The Algarve's favorable climate with over 300 flyable days per year ensures uninterrupted training. Courses include instruction fees, pre and post-flight briefings, landing fees, and use of equipment. Fly365 Algarve also offers ground school and conversion training, with the option to complete training in the UK during summer months. Personalized service and affordable accommodation options are available, making Fly365 Algarve an ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking a comprehensive and efficient flight training experience.
